value:
$WmMPID_ミリエル,ch04_44_Miriel_F_Normal,Face|I see... So you wish to place the four
of us under the purview of this
so-called "Order of Heroes," was it?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|For the sake of Askr and its people,
yes. We would be honored to count
you as allies.$k$p$WmMPID_パリス,ch04_45_Paris_M_Normal,Face|For not only the kingdom, but also its
people, huh? Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_バジーリオ,ch04_47_Basiglio_M_Normal,Face|So says His Highness. But what do
you make of it, Flavia?$k$p$WmMPID_フラヴィア,ch04_46_Flavia_F_Normal,Face|What any khan worth their salt would
think of a situation like this.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh! Does that mean you'll—$k$p$WmMPID_フラヴィア,ch04_46_Flavia_F_Normal,Face|Not so fast.$k$pI understand that you need warriors
to protect your kingdom...$k$pBut just because we're warriors
doesn't mean we'll fight for any
cause—or for just anyone.$k$p$WmMPID_ミリエル,ch04_44_Miriel_F_Normal,Face|A pertinent observation.$k$p$WmMPID_フラヴィア,ch04_46_Flavia_F_Normal,Face|If you think you can simply use us as
expendable soldiers in your war, we'll
have to not-so-kindly pass.$k$pIf we decided to fight for Askr, it'd be
on our own terms.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We'd never treat Heroes like that!$k$p$WmMPID_バジーリオ,ch04_47_Basiglio_M_Normal,Face|Let's cut to the chase, lass. If you
want to earn our trust, you'd better
prove yourselves on the battlefield.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Come again?$k$p$WmMPID_バジーリオ,ch04_47_Basiglio_M_Normal,Face|In Regna Ferox, we cut with our
swords, not our words.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Wait just a minute... Are you saying
we need to do some kind of duel to
the death just to earn your respect?$k$p$WmMPID_バジーリオ,ch04_47_Basiglio_M_Normal,Face|Not to the death, no. But that makes
things a bit less interesting, so let's
spice it up by splittin' into teams.$k$pSpeakin' of, I call dibs on Lon'qu.
He'll be the next West-Khan after
I give up the reins, so it's only fair.$k$p$WmMPID_フラヴィア,ch04_46_Flavia_F_Normal,Face|Naturally, Priam and Miriel will be on
our team as well. It looks like you will
need two more.$k$p$WmMPID_パリス,ch04_45_Paris_M_Normal,Face|Sounds like an excellent chance to
test my skills, so count me in.$k$p$WmMPID_ミリエル,ch04_44_Miriel_F_Normal,Face|I must protest. My allegiance lies with
the Shepherds, not some Feroxi
warmongers.$k$p$WmMPID_バジーリオ,ch04_47_Basiglio_M_Normal,Face|Oh, c'mon.... We were both just
summoned to Askr, right? That
practically makes us pals!$k$p$WmMPID_フラヴィア,ch04_46_Flavia_F_Normal,Face|Then it's settled. Prince, I trust you'll
have a team prepared by tomorrow.$k$p$WmMPID_パリス,ch04_45_Paris_M_Normal,Face|And you'd better bring your best, or
it'll just be a waste of my time.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm not sure we— Oh, there they go...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Are we really going to let them order
us around like this?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|As much as I don't like it, this might
be the only way to earn their trust...$k$p
